title: Citi Named #1 Cash Management Bank in Latin America by Euromoney for the Second Consecutive Year
summary: Cash Management Bank in Latin America for the second consecutive year in Euromoney's prestigious annual Cash Management Survey 2016. Furthermore, the bank has been ranked by financial institutions as the Best Bank for Dollar Transactions in Latin America.
tag-1: Citi Named #1 Cash Management Bank in Latin America by Euromoney for the Second Consecutive Year
tag-3: Cash Management Bank in Latin America for the second consecutive year in Euromoney's prestigious annual Cash Management Survey 2016. Furthermore, the bank has been ranked by financial institutions as the Best Bank for Dollar Transactions in Latin America.
tag-4: "It is an honor for us to receive this award the second year in a row. The corporations participating in this survey have complex cash management needs in Latin America and across the globe," said Steve Donovan, Latin America Region Head, Treasury and Trade Solutions. "Citi's strong presence in 23 markets in the region, the solutions and platforms connectivity allow us to serve our clients and enable them to operate seamlessly wherever they are."
tag-5: The survey receives responses from the leading cash managers, treasurers and financial officers worldwide, and is considered the benchmark survey for the global cash management industry. In total, more than 300 banks that provide cash management services received votes in this year's survey. Euromoney received a record number of validated votes: more than 32,000 corporates took part in the survey, and more than 2,200 financial institutions voted.
tag-6: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
